sense.def:
A riddle
je uganka, v kateri zastavimo na videz nesmiselno vprašanje, na katero je mogoče najti duhovit odgovor, na primer:
‘When is a door not a door?’—‘When it's ajar’
.

A riddle
je tudi karkoli, česar si ne znamo razložiti.

seg.quote: I was trying to solve the perplexing riddle of how to help my people.
